name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Part 6 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.

First word of seven letters-

Painters, sculptors and writers etc.

Second word of six letters-

Narrow sea channel.

Third word of five letters-

Stringed musical instrument from India.

Fourth word of four letters-

Russian emperor.

Last word of three letters-

Rodent.

New word of six letters-

Woodwind musical instruments.

Second word of five letters-

Gas, coal and oil used to produce energy.

Third word of four letters-

Detonates an explosion.

Fourth word of three letters-

Initiate legal proceedings for compensation.

Fifth word of two letters-

Acronym of the United States.
